00019 QRectF kCardItem::boundingRect() const
00020 {
00021         qreal penW = 0.5;
00022         qreal shadowW = 2.0;
00023         return rect().adjusted(-penW, -penW, penW + shadowW, penW + shadowW);
00024 }

00026 void kCardItem::paint( QPainter* painter, const QStyleOptionGraphicsItem* options, QWidget* widget )
00027 {
00028     painter->setOpacity(opacity());
00029     painter->setPen(Qt::NoPen);
00030     painter->setBrush(QColor(0, 0, 0, 64));
00031     painter->drawRoundRect(rect().translated(2, 2));
00032 
00033     QLinearGradient gradient(rect().topLeft(), rect().bottomRight());
00034     const QColor col = _mBrush.color();
00035     gradient.setColorAt(0, col);
00036     gradient.setColorAt(1, col.dark(int(200 + _mLastVal * 50)));
00037     painter->setBrush(gradient);
00038 
00039 
00040     painter->setPen(QPen(Qt::black, 1));
00041     painter->drawRoundRect(rect());
00042     if (!_mPixmap.isNull()) {
00043         painter->scale(1.95, 1.95);
00044         painter->drawPixmap(-_mPixmap.width() / 2, -_mPixmap.height() / 2, _mPixmap);
00045     }
00046 }

00049 //METHOD
00050 qreal kCardItem::opacity() const
00051 {
00052         kCardItem *parent = parentItem() ? (kCardItem *)parentItem() : 0;
00053         return _mOpacity + (parent ? parent->opacity() : 0);
00054 }
00055 
00056 void kCardItem::setOpacity(qreal opacity)
00057 {
00058         _mOpacity = opacity;
00059         update();
00060 }
00061 
00071 void kCardItem::setPixmap(const QPixmap &pixmap)
00072 {
00073         //store the first QPixmap assignment
00074         if (_mSourcePixmap.isNull())
00075                 _mSourcePixmap = pixmap;
00076         //set a null pixmap (card)
00077         if (!_mPixmap.isNull())
00078                 _mPixmap = pixmap;
00079         else
00080                 _mPixmap = _mSourcePixmap; //restore the source pixmap
00081     if (scene() && isVisible())
00082         update();
00083 }

00086 //Event (Keyboard and Mouse)
00087 void kCardItem::keyPressEvent(QKeyEvent *event)
00088 {
00089         if (event->key() != Qt::Key_Return) {
00090         QGraphicsRectItem::keyPressEvent(event);
00091         return;
00092     }
00093         setPixmap(QPixmap());
00094 }
00095 
00096 void kCardItem::keyReleaseEvent(QKeyEvent *event)
00097 {
00098     if (event->key() != Qt::Key_Return) {
00099         QGraphicsRectItem::keyReleaseEvent(event);
00100         return;
00101     }
